content: Wow detailing drawbridge I just started out with some craft
sticks and I cut the ends off so they're like four inches long right but I did
some a little bit of nicking into the craft sticks themselves with my scissors
to make it kind of have a ruined dilapidated look and for the next phase
I just glued these together and I put some cross supports for the next stage
as well as just to give it some strength right and I just hot glued this all
together and then for this next stage I took some pieces of cardboard and cut
between the corrugations with a exacto blade or just a box cutter and cut
between the corrugations without going through the cardboard so I got all those
set and I made them different shapes and sizes and then I just hot glued them to
this lattice here the bridge piece and I just added some hot glue on top of it to
give a little bit of hot glue to give some texture to this thing to make it
look like boards and that kind of thing and then for the end I just painted it
up with some dark brown and it's a few lighter Browns like grey and let's go to
the table and I'll show you what it looks like in front of the ruined castle
front here we are on our windswept plateau let's remove Roderick off this
dilapidated drop Ridge here and there we go I think it really looks cool a nice
pathway there but it looks very dangerous like it could collapse at any
moment when they try to walk on this thing the hot glue really gives it a
nice texture just some dark brown and a few grays lighter Brown there we go
really nice ruined drawbridge you
